name: Command Center Earth
description:
Listen up, pilot. Earth is under siege from a meteor storm, and the odds aren't in our favor. But we're not going down without a fight.

You're at the heart of Command Center Earth, the nerve center of our last-ditch defense. Your mission: guide our missiles to intercept the incoming meteors. Your years of training have prepared you for this moment.

Remember, the fate of humanity rests in your hands.

In Command Center Earth, your job as pilot is to guide a missile through a series of increasingly difficult asteroid fields to intercept and destroy incoming meteors.

Features

  • 25 unique and challenging levels.
  • Competitive leaderboards.
  • No loading screens for quick, pick-up-and-play sessions.
  • Simple controls, demanding gameplay.
